Posts.Content: too_young_momof2 wrote: I was wondering if anyone has skin mets? I have had many issues with healing from many failed attempts of reconstruction. I went to my family Dr with tiny water blister type things on my legs, he said it was folicilitice sp? I was put on antibiotics but it never went away. I then went back for blood work and have developed 3 what I thought were boils on my bc side in a line starting under the "breast" to back rib cage, GP put me back on strong anti biotics. I went to see my plastic surgeon today for an assesment on my open wound from the 3 failed recon and asked him if my skin infection had anything to do with my bad healing problems? He looked at it and said he is concerned and said if they are not gone by my next visit he is doing a biopsy. One is quite large about a quater but the hardness underneath is much larger. They are not leaking fluid and there are no heads and are very hard??? I am very concerned now and cannot find alot of info! Please please any info? Michelle Dx 6/2/2006, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, 8/12 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Chemotherapy 7/12/2006 Adriamycin (doxorubicin), Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Targeted Therapy 10/6/2006 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Surgery 2/6/2007 Prophylactic mastectomy: Left, Right; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Radiation Therapy 3/16/2007 Breast, Lymph nodes Surgery 5/10/2007 Reconstruction (left); Reconstruction (right) Surgery 7/28/2007 Reconstruction (right) Surgery 8/14/2007 Reconstruction (right) Surgery 4/14/2009 Reconstruction (right): Latissimus dorsi flap, Tissue expander placement Surgery 10/14/2009 Reconstruction (right) Surgery 2/27/2010 Reconstruction (left): Nipple reconstruction; Reconstruction (right): Nipple reconstruction Dx 5/20/2014, IDC, Stage IV, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Surgery 6/16/2014 Prophylactic ovary removal Targeted Therapy 7/2/2014 Perjeta (pertuzumab) Chemotherapy 7/2/2014 Taxotere (docetaxel) Targeted Therapy 7/3/2014 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: too_young_momof2 wrote: Hello all So many questions running through my head today. Just received biopsy results that I do in fact have recurrence in supraclavical nodes... June 2nd would have been my 8 year mark from original IDC dx.Â  Am I now stage IV??? What should I expect going to oncology appointment on Friday? So worried.. ...
